about.subTitle: Our mission
about.title: Why we do it
about.shortText: In March 2017 our founder Milo was on the ski slope. He noticed a sign with the CO₂ emissions of a week of winter sports. How strange that you can't compensate that, he thought. With a plane ticket you can. Once at home, he read in a study by CE Delft that goods and clothing have a greater impact on the environment than cars, planes and meat combined. Surely you should be able to compensate for that?
about.longText: If the government doesn't do anything, I'll do it, Milo decided. He quit his job and enrolled at the Chamber of Commerce. So he started CO₂ok on October 4, 2017. His goal? To enable everyone to make their online purchases climate-neutral. At the same time, he wants to raise the standard of living of people in Third World countries. In short: a win-win situation. In 2019 Lodi and Nick became co-owners of CO₂ok. They have a commercial background and wanted to start their own business. They also wanted to use their knowledge for the environment. When they heard about CO₂ok they were instantly enthusiastic. They phoned Milo and soon their collaboration was a fact. Milo is responsible for the ideas and the technology and Lodi and Nick for the operational management. Their dream? In five years' time, all products will be produced in a climate-neutral way and compensation for your purchases will no longer be necessary. As a result, CO₂ok has become superfluous.
about.imgText: We help environmentally-minded consumers and retailers to compensate for products that burden the climate.
about.title2: Meet the people who make this all happen

cause.s1_text: By associating your webshop with a good cause your customers are more inclined to choose your webshop and return. This is also called ‘Cause Marketing’
cause.s2_text-1: Cause marketing generates 7x more revenue than price discounts for toy manufacturer.
cause.s2_text-2: Climate change is the most well-known CSR subject for consumers – 59% can even define it and give an example.
cause.s2_text-3: The non-profits and companies use each other: the good cause is getting attention and money, the company can contribute and improves its image.
cause.s2_text-4: Cause Marketing improves “Brand Story” and helps with customer loyalty.
cause.s3_row1_text: When choosing between two brands of equal quality and price, 90% of customers pick are likely to pick a “cause branded” product
cause.s3_row2_text: 3 out of 4 respondents agree that companies can take actions to both increase profits and help improve economic/ social conditions for society
cause.s3_row3_text: 92% of consumers declared having a positive image of a company when a company tackles a social or environmental problem
cause.s3_row4_text: 66% of consumers want brands to take a socio-political stance
cause.s3_row4_link: Spout Social’s ‘Championing Change in the Age of Social Media’ 2018
cause.s4_row1_text: We’ve got a marketingkit for your Cause Marketing! Send an e-mail to jos@co2ok.eco to receive it.
cause.s4_row3_text: More revenue and help fight climate change?

faq.faq1_title: Why installing the Ninja App requires permission to “Read and change all data on websites you visit'?
faq.faq1_text: For the Ninja App to work properly it needs to have access to the information about the website you are visiting to know if you’re on one of our partners’ sites. In short, the Ninja App downloads the list of partner shops, then works in the background, comparing the website you’re viewing against the downloaded list, and if there is a match, it shows our CO₂ok button. The information about visited websites does not leave your computer, so your privacy is protected. The Ninja App has an open code available at Github so anyone can view and audit it to make sure it is safe to use.
faq.faq2_title: Does the Ninja App track my purchases or internet activity?
faq.faq2_text: No! We don’t need your Data to fight climate change and therefore we don’t collect or save any personal shopping data. Our goal is to make the world a better place and not collecting data. We do get information about what kind of products are purchased and how many items are bought each month, but we do not track individual users’ purchases & don’t store them!
faq.faq3_title: What stores does the Ninja App work with?
faq.faq3_text: We have partnered with several big e-commerce businesses such as Ebay, Bol.com, Booking.com, CoolBlue, Aliexpress, Etsy, and over 22000 others. See the list of all participating stores.
faq.faq4_title: How do shops benefit from being in CO₂ok Ninja program?
faq.faq4_text:
Our users are clients who have a strong incentive to buy from our partner shops and not their competition.

We are preparing multiple new features such as highlighting partners’ websites in search results. These features directly drive new consumers to partners’ stores.

Thanks to CO₂ok the brands of the shops are associated with a great cause. They show that climate and our environment matters to them as well and with this they boost their image.
faq.faq5_title: How big is your piece of the cake?
faq.faq5_text: We invest 75% of the commission in the CO₂ compensation. The remaining 25% is much needed to keep CO₂ok going. We will always be open and transparent and therefore report our income and spending each year.
faq.faq6_title: I only shop at Amazon and already use Amazon Smile program, is there any reason for me to install the Ninja App?
faq.faq6_text: First of all, our partners usually donate 2-12 times more through the Ninja App (1-6%) than Amazon does through Amazon Smile (only 0.5% of the final price). So, if you care about having as big a positive impact on the world as you can, using the Ninja App either instead of or in addition to Amazon Smile is a way to achieve that. Moreover, there are a lot of products or services available in our partner stores that are not available on Amazon. For example, travel services (hotels, flights, train tickets, car rentals), financial products, or sport clubs’ official apparel.
faq.faq7_text: We would like to thank Altruisto for putting their code open source so we could fork our own project based on their previous work. Altruisto does a great job at donating to charities through online shoppings. Their GitHub repo can be found here: Altruisto GitHub repository
faq.faq8_title: Does it cost me anything to use the Ninja App?
faq.faq8_text: No, the Ninja App is absolutely free to use. The prices in the online stores are exactly the same whether you use the app or not.
faq.faq9_title: I am not buying in any of these stores, is there any reason for me to install the Ninja App?
faq.faq9_text:
Yes, there are three reasons:
1) We are constantly working on new partnerships, so we may partner with stores that you do use in the near future. It’s easier to have it already installed rather than regularly check if stores that you use have been added.
2) If you even once decide to buy from our partners stores, having the Ninja App already installed can be a difference with the output of CO₂ in the world. It’s better to have it installed just in case, rather than miss an easy opportunity to do a lot of good for free.
3) It is easier to establish new partnerships with a bigger user base: the more users the Ninja App has, the easier it is to convince new stores to join our initiative. Therefore, by installing the Ninja App, you make it more probable that we will partner with shops you use in the future.
faq.faq10_text: After installing the Ninja app you will see a our “Shop CO₂ok” box whilst shopping in one of our partner stores. Simply click this box and you will be redirected back to the partner store (exactly where you were before). From then on, whenever you buy something, CO₂ok receives a portion of the price you pay (usually between 1% and 6%). We donate our profits to carefully selected organisations such as Atmosfair. Some stores will require you to repeat the process after some time. You are a mobile Ninja - see here.
faq.faq11_title: How can I be sure that the money will be used to compensate greenhouse gasses?
faq.faq11_text: Atmosfair and Fair Climate Fund provide us with certificates to prove we compensated. Additionally, we will report our income and spending each year.
faq.faq12_text: Greenhouse gases are emitted during the production and transport of the products you purchase. By investing in products that prevent an equal amount of these greenhouse gases to be emitted, your purchase can be made climate neutral. So how do you reduce emissions? By financing renewable energy and emission reducing projects, future emissions are prevented: a net reduction. (details)
faq.faq13_title: So how do you reduce emissions?
faq.faq13_text: By financing renewable energy and emission reducing projects, future emissions are prevented: a net reduction. (details)
faq.faq14_title: How do you determine the carbon footprint of products?
faq.faq14_text: We use manufacturer data whenever we can, since this is the most accurate. If the manufacturers don’t know or report this data, we will estimate it, gradually improving our accuracy. (details)
faq.faq15_title: Will my entire contribution go to CO2 compensation?
faq.faq15_text: Initially, 75% of your contribution will go to CO2 compensation through Atmosfair. Our 25% margin will be used to keep CO₂ok alive and ensure more and more online stores offer CO2 compensation. We will report our income and spending each year.
faq.faq16_title: What kind of projects will we finance?
faq.faq16_text: In addition to renewable energy projects such as solar, wind and hydropower, we will also fund projects that increase energy efficiency. For instance, the Save80 cooking stoves, which are 80% more energy efficient, reduce CO2 emissions and offer a tremendous health boost.(View the other projects here)

home.section1_title:
Become a Ninja and
shop climate neutral!
home.section1_smallText: Activate the extension and you’ll be shopping climate neutral without a cost!
home.section2_smallText: There are no extra costs for you. The CO₂ compensation is fully covered by the shop.
home.section2_step1_text: Simply register with us and install the app. The app is safe, open source, and respects your privacy
home.section2_step2_text: Start shopping in your Ninja suit. After paying we will receive a commission from the shop.
home.section2_step3_text: With this commission we finance projects that directly reduce greenhouse gas emissions. In effect this makes your purchase climate neutral. Thank you 💚.
home.section3_title: Together we can make a change
home.section4_title: WITH YOUR HELP WE SUPPORT THESE SUSTAINABLE PROJECTS!
home.section4_small_text: Check out the various projects your clicks finance.
home.section4_proj1: Sustainable energy sources like the sun, wind and hydro power don't have negative effects on the climate. Very little greenhouse gases are emitted and there is no air polution.
home.section4_proj2: The Save80 cookers which use 5x less wood, which means 5x less emission.
home.section5_title: Together we can make a change
home.section5_quote:
"Startup CO₂ok makes
online shopping
climate neutral."
-WWF
home.section5_btn: STARTUP CO₂ok MAKES ONLINE SHOPPING CLIMATE NEUTRAL

home2.section_2_title: Increase your conversion. Fight climate change.
home2.section_2_text: CO₂ok makes your shipping climate friendly and gives consumers the opportunity to make their purchases climate neutral. The easy integration ensures a broadening of your CSR strategy within a minute. Our service responds to the needs of consumers, lowers cart abandonment, increases retention and shows that you care about our planet!
home2.section_3_title: Top 10 impact van de gemiddelde Nederlander
home2.testimonial_content: The first time I got called about the CO₂ok-plugin, I didn’t like the idea at all. (The second and third times neither, by the way). I knew about the concept of CO₂ compensation and think it’s a good idea. But hey, extra text and images costs visitors – they say. And also: ‘Keep your customer journey short.’ But this plug-in contributes to the sustainable story of my web store. It enhances our credibility and thus contributes to our revenue. And more customers than expected compensate CO₂.
home2.s3_title: that Cause Marketing will bring your business
home2.s3_row1_text: The results of A/B testing show that our service provides on average a 15% higher conversion, can be as high as 20%.
home2.s3_row2_text: Brands with a purpose set on improving our quality of life outperform the stock market by 120%.
home2.s3_row3_text: 92% of consumers stated that they have a more positive image of a company when a company addresses a social or environmental problem
home2.s3_row4_text: 66% of consumers want that brands adopt a socio-political attitude
home2.s3_row4_link: Spout Social’s ‘Championing Change in the Age of Social Media’
home2.section_4_title: This is what we do it for
home2.section_4_text: Renewable energy from sources like the sun, wind and water has no negative effect on climate and produces a minimum of greenhouse gas emission and no air pollution. This in contradiction to fossil fuels such as coal, oil and gas. CO₂ok supports are in renewable energy: providing starting funds for solar energy and hydropower projects.
home2.section_5_title: Together we can make a change
home2.section_5_btn: Join us in the fight against climate change!
home2.cfd-section-text: With CFD your parcel deliveries will become Climate Friendly as neutralisation of the emissions is included in our service! You will gain valuable insights in the climate impact of your webshop through Bewust Bezorgd. Finally, you can give your consumers the option to choose the most environmentally friendly delivery option. Allow the consumer to choose sustainability and install the service within 3 clicks. Responsible e-commerce has never been this simple!
home2.bb-section-title: 'Bewust Bezorgd’ - a partnership for impact enhancement
home2.bb-section-text: CO₂ok is joining forces with Thuiswinkel.org in the fight for more sustainability in e-commerce. Thuiswinkel.org has developed Bewust Bezorgd together with Topsector Logistiek, which accurately calculates the emissions of delivering a parcel. This gives webshops valuable insight into the climate impact of the delivery, regardless of the shipping company. As such Bewust Bezorgd allows webshops to become more sustainable and cost efficient at the same time, meanwhile building an even stronger brand image!

corona.s1_text: We developed a plugin button designed for webshops. With this button consumers make their online purchases climate neutral. Given the extraordinary circumstances we are in, we decided to put our plugin to use in the battle against the corona virus. All contributions made with the button are directly donated to the Netherlands Red Cross Foundation
corona.s2_text: If you make a purchase within a webshop partnered with CO₂ok, you will encounter the donation button during checkout.
corona.s3_text: On clicking, the button will ask you what amount you wish to donate. This will then be added to the total amount of your order and you check out and pay for your purchase the way you are used to.
corona.s4_text: We take care of the rest and transfer your contribution to giro 7244 of the Netherlands Red Cross Foundation.
corona.s5_text: Your donation helps them relieve those affected by corona, in the Netherlands and abroad.
corona.calcTitle: Why does CO₂ok help raising money for the Red Cross?
corona.shortText: CO2ok is always at the forefront in the fight for a sustainable world. In times of an immediate crisis like this we can’t sit back and watch. That’s why we put our technology to use to help battle corona and we will continue to do so as long as needed. Should you wish to find out how we help counter climate change, please visit the rest of our site.
corona.shortText2: Luckily, there are ways to estimate the carbon costs without having to wait for the complete data. That means that CO₂ok can start fighting climate change today!💚🌍. Of course we're working hard to make these estimation more and more accurate. In the end it's the responsability of the manufacturers to provide accurate data.
corona.longText: When the consumer is able to buy their product in a climate neutral way, CO₂ emission can be reduced. This way the consumer has the means to contribute to a healthy and pleasant environment for now and future generations. Entrepreneurs are an important influence through the means of offering such tools. However there is no easy way for entrepreneurs to offer their products climate neutral.

compensation.s1_text: The transport and production of any purchased item causes the emission of greenhouse gases. Manufacturers try to reduce this emission, but most fail to show actual progress. A purchase of *that* item you want can become climate neutral through CO₂-compensation.
compensation.s2_text: We compute the greenhouse gases that are emitted during production and transport. We convert these to equal amounts of CO₂, for example, 1 gram of methane equals 100 grams of CO₂.
compensation.s3_text: If you choose to make your purchase CO₂ok, you will pay a tiny extra amount upon purchase.
compensation.s4_text: 75% of this amount is used to finance projects of sustainable energy and CO₂-emission reduction (via our certified partners, Atmosfair and Fair Climate Fund). The remaining 25% will be used to keep CO₂ok alive and ensure that more and more online stores offer CO2 offsetting.
compensation.s5_text: These projects actively reduce the amount of emitted CO₂. This CO₂ reduction matches the emission of your purchase – your purchase is climate neutral!
compensation.shortText: How can we provide accurate CO2 emission data for all our retail partners? Calculating carbon emissions isn’t easy, after all. There are many different ways to calculate carbon emissions, all based on different assumptions and methodologies. The methods vary in their approach to alternatives, carbon-equivalent emissions, LCA cycles, allocation of the various emissions, what exactly to take into account. Even among sustainability researchers, there is no true consensus on how to deal with all these variations in outcome. Calculating the carbon emissions for long lists of products can easily take researchers 2 years, and few manufacturers provide the exact emission data for their products.
compensation.shortText2: Luckily, there are ways to estimate the carbon costs without having to wait for the complete data. That means that CO₂ok can start fighting climate change today!💚🌍. Of course we're working hard to make these estimation more and more accurate. In the end it's the responsability of the manufacturers to provide accurate data.
compensation.longText: When the consumer is able to buy their product in a climate neutral way, CO₂ emission can be reduced. This way the consumer has the means to contribute to a healthy and pleasant environment for now and future generations. Entrepreneurs are an important influence through the means of offering such tools. However there is no easy way for entrepreneurs to offer their products climate neutral.

plugin.WP_step4: After a few moments the plugin will be installed, all there is left to do is activating it by hitting the button 'Activate':
plugin.WP_step5: That’s all! If you have any questions/run into an issue, we’d love to help out via phone, whatsapp or mail. Thanks for helping us fight climate change!

plugin.WP_step5-Corona: That’s all! If you have any questions/run into an issue, we’d love to help out via phone, whatsapp or mail. Thanks for helping us fight Corona!
plugin.Magento_step0: Cool that you're helping fight climate change! 💚 The extension is for Magento version 1.X. The installation is quite straightforward; it can be downloaded here: https://co2ok.online/magento-extension and you can install it as follows:
plugin.Magento_step2: Select the extension file under 'Direct package file upload'.
plugin.Magento_step3: Hit Upload - the extension starts installing.
plugin.Magento_step4: Through System->Configuration you can reach the control panel (See picture, right bottom corner):
plugin.Magento_step5: At the control panel you can configure various settings, like disabling/enabling the button or changing its location.
plugin.Shopify_step0: Visit the Shopify app install page to start the installation
plugin.Shopify_step2: if necessary, enter your Shopify domain.
plugin.Shopify_step3: We're waiting on Shopify for the final review step, but things are delayed at the moment. Rest assured it's tested thorougly!
plugin.Shopify_step5: After a few moments the plugin will be installed.
plugin.Shopify_step6: That’s all! If you have any questions/run into an issue, we’d love to help out via phone, whatsapp or mail. Thanks for helping us fight climate change!
plugin.Shopify_step6-Corona: That’s all! If you have any questions/run into an issue, we’d love to help out via phone, whatsapp or mail. Thanks for helping us fight Corona!

profile.title: Profile
profile.card1_text: (Our developers are working hard to make the CO2 counter work in the near future)
profile.card2_subtitle: Which co2 compensation project would you like to support when using Co2ok?
profile.card3_text: Tell your friends and family about the Ninja App and share the link to fight climate change.
profile.card3_social: Share our vision, make others happy with the Ninja App :)

projects.section1_text: DE We support a variety of CO₂ compensation projects, coordinated by Atmosfair and Fair Climate Fund. 90% of their projects are certified with the CDM Gold Standard, which is the most stringent standard for climate protection projects.
projects.section2_title: Projects that get rid of fossil fuels
projects.section2_text: Renewable energy from sources like the sun, wind and water has no negative effect on climate and produces a minimum of greenhouse gas emission and no air pollution. This in contradiction to fossil fuels such as coal, oil and gas. CO₂ok supports are in renewable energy: providing starting funds for solar energy and hydropower projects.
projects.s2_text1: Wind energy is the biggest renewable energy source in the Netherlands. It contributes up to 6% of the total electricity production. The Netherlands is known for innovative use of offshore wind turbines.
projects.s2_text2: Solar energy offers a clean, sustainable source of power. However, it is costly to implement and starting funds are often unavailable. That’s why CO₂ok helps funding solar energy projects that require financial support.
projects.s2_text3: Hydropower energy is power derived from energy of falling water or fast running water. The disadvantage of a hydroelectric powerstation is the high cost of startup. Because we value this renewable power source, we support hydropower projects.
projects.section3_title: Emission reduction projects outside the Netherlands
projects.section3_text: These energy efficiency projects support sustainability development in developing countries by handing over technology, fighting poverty and reducing the emission of CO₂.
projects.s3_title3: Why our focus on developing countries?
projects.s3_text1: More efficient cooking appliances can save up to 80% of energy (and therefore CO₂ emission) in Africa and India. Thanks to their energy efficiency, these cooking appliances save time used for gathering fuel and reduce deforestation. Their decreased smoke and CO₂ production also contribute to better health.
projects.s3_text2: About 70% of the inhabitants of Lesotho, South Africa, live in the countryside, without connection to an electricity power grid. People use fossil-fuel-based candles and petroleum lamps for lighting, harming the climate and human health. Atmosfair and Solar Lights provide solar panels and Solar Home Systems.
projects.s3_text3: CO₂ is a worldwide problem, and it doesn’t really matter where on earth you fight. Atmosfair, Fair Climate Fund and CO₂ok are most effective in third world countries. The projects we fund can not only help reduce CO₂ emission but also improve the local quality of life, fuel the local economy and improve people’s health.

retailers.subTitle: Fight climate change
retailers.title: Greener and more customers and sustainable
retailers.mainText:
As awareness about the importance of preserving the environment continues to grow among
                                consumers, companies are increasingly looking for ways to “go green”. Of course, you
                                need to protect your bottom line as well. By enabling your customers to make their
                                purchase climate neutral with CO₂ok, you can do your bit to drive back climate change.
                                CO₂ok lets you increase the amount of customers with no upfront costs.
retailers.testimonial_content: The first time we got called about the CO₂ok-plugin, we didn’t like the idea at all. (The second, third and fourth times neither, by the way). I knew about the concept of CO₂ compensation already and like the idea. But hey, extra text and images costs visitors – they say. And also: ‘Keep your customer journey short.’ But this plug-in contributes to the sustainable story of my online shop. It enhances our credibility and thus contributes to our revenue. And more customers than expected compensate CO₂. That’s why I’m happy with the CO₂ok-plugin
retailers.row_text1: Besides the plugin, Co2ok offers various services which can assist you in building a solid MVO strategy. For example: did you know that broadening your CSR strategy is likely to be more efficient than advertising?
retailers.row_text1_extra: Everyone tries to contribute daily to build a greener and more sustainable future. As do you, as a retailer. But some things are simply beyond your control. For example: it is quite impossible to have insight into every step of the supply chain. Co2ok enables you to fight climate change in a simple and efficient way.
retailers.row_text2:
As a retailer, you naturally try to run your business as sustainably as possible. However, some
                        things are beyond your control – the manufacturing and shipping of your products for example.
                        Manufacturers take too long to become climate neutral. CO₂ok fills this gap and allows your
                        customers to buy everything they want, without contributing to climate change! This is also
                        called:
retailers.row_text2_extra:
You reach even more customers if you go along with our marketing campaign. During our campaign
                        you can easily ride along on our network. We post on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter and are
                        featured in magazines and on radio! If you would like to know more you can contact us.
retailers.row_text3:
The plugin has a 3 month free trial for starting webshop owners. It only takes 1 minute to install the
                        CO₂ok-plugin. When you integrated the plugin in your webshop, your customers can make their own
                        choice to contribute. That way they make their purchase climate neutral. The minor extra fee is
                        on average 2%.
retailers.row_text4:
Both installing our plugin and using it can be done with just a couple clicks. Nothing about the
                        ordering-process changes. You won’t lose customers by any tedious procedures. If you bump into a
                        problem with the plugin, we’re always available through mail or by phone.
retailers.mainText2: The compensation gets paid to you by the customer. CO₂ok sends a digital invoice at the end of each 3 month term. With the proceeds we support Atmosfair and Fair Climate Fund, two certified organisations which finance several CO₂-compensating projects each year.
retailers.paragraph1:
● < 5K monthly visitors

● CO₂ok plugin

● Climate Friendly Delivery
retailers.paragraph2:
● < 50K monthly visitors

● All Startup services

● Delivery footprint insights
retailers.paragraph3:
● All premium services

● Tailormade services

● A/B testing

● CSR partnership

As awareness about the importance of preserving the environment continues to grow among
                                consumers, companies are increasingly looking for ways to “go green”. Of course, you

webshops.title2: Don't just take our word for it

howItWorks.mainText: It's quick and easy to install CO₂ok into your webstore, and your customers will have the option to offset the environmental impact of their orders with a single click.
howItWorks.title: CO₂ok is an easy way to show your shop cares
howItWorks.subTitle: CO₂ok Plugin
howItWorks.steps_subtitle: Become a climate neutral webstore in four easy steps
howItWorks.s1_text: Quickly and seamlessly add the CO₂ok plugin to your webstore
howItWorks.s2_text: Our default settings will automatically fit perfectly into your store, but if you like, you have the option to choose a style and placement option.
howItWorks.s3_text: On the shopping cart / checkout page the customer sees the CO₂ok plugin. Adds an average of 2% on top of the purchase amount. (For this we calculate all greenhouse gases that are released during production and transport.)
howItWorks.s4_text: Projects that directly lead to less greenhouse gas emissions. For this we work together with our certified partners Atmosfair and Fair Climate Fund.

clients.mainText: After conducting an extensive A/B test with a medium-large sized online retailer in the bathroom sector, we achieved 15% conversion uplift! At other webshops we see up to 20% conversion increase. More details available upon request.

retailLanding.row_text1: Besides the plugin, Co2ok offers various services which can assist you in building a solid MVO strategy.
retailLanding.row_text1_extra: Everyone tries to contribute daily to build a greener and more sustainable future. As do you, as a retailer. But some things are simply beyond your control. For example: it is quite impossible to have insight into every step of the supply chain. Co2ok enables you to fight climate change in a simple and efficient way.
retailLanding.row_text2_extra:
You reach even more customers if you go along with our marketing campaign. During our campaign
                        you can easily ride along on our network. We post on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter and are
                        featured in magazines and on radio! If you would like to know more you can contact us.
retailLanding.row_text3: Make your delivery climate friendly - compensation of the emissions is included in our service!
retailLanding.row_text4: Integration takes a few minutes - or let us do it for you!
